text: Breast reduction is a plastic surgery to make human breasts smaller. The surgeon takes out fat, skin, and glands. It is done on women most of the time, but men can also get it. In 2005, more than 113,000 women had breast reductions.Breast Implants 411: "Breast Reductions on the Rise as More Women Choose to Reduce in Order to Increase Their Quality of Life" Thursday, May 14, 2020 Aside from aesthetic reasons, many women choose to undergo breast reduction surgery to help reduce back strain or breathing problems caused by having large breasts. ==References== Category:Surgery Category:Breasts
title: Breast reduction
